item.title: Getting started with the MVC pattern
item.description: Learn the basics of the MVC pattern and get a feel for how it works. This blog post is for you if you are completely new to MVC or to web development in general.

item.title: The evolution of my portfolio website
item.description: Ayy! Welcome to my new portfolio/personal website. In this blog post I'm going to go over the evolution of my portfolio website and how it got to where it is today.
